detail_desc: Joggers in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Joggers in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Short chunky metal chain necklace. Adjustable length 40-47 cm.
Hoop earrings. One pair in textured metal and two pairs decorated with pearly plastic beads. Diameter from 1.2 cm to 2.5 cm.

Six ear cuffs in various designs. Two with pearly plastic beads, two in metal decorated with plastic beads and two in metal decorated with sparkly glass stones. Can be worn on non-pierced ears. Size 1.3 cm.

Six ear cuffs in various designs. Two with pearly plastic beads, two in metal decorated with plastic beads and two in metal decorated with sparkly glass stones. Can be worn on non-pierced ears. Size 1.3 cm.
Two-strand metal necklace with one thin and one chunkier chain. The thinner chain has a round pendant. Adjustable length 36-44 cm.
Three-strand metal neckline with chains in various designs. Two decorated with a metal pendant. Adjustable length, 39-47 cm.
Three-strand metal neckline with chains in various designs. Two decorated with a metal pendant. Adjustable length, 39-47 cm.
Shortie briefs in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with a mid waist, lined gusset and medium coverage at the back. The cotton content of the briefs is organic.
Shortie briefs in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with a mid waist, lined gusset and medium coverage at the back. The cotton content of the briefs is organic.
Shortie briefs in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with a mid waist, lined gusset and medium coverage at the back. The cotton content of the briefs is organic.

Large, elasticated fabric scrunchie. Diameter 16 cm.
Round hair clip in metal decorated with pearly plastic beads. Diameter 4.5 cm.
Metal hair clips decorated with pearly plastic beads. Length 4.5 cm.
Blouse in cotton seersucker with a sewn-in wrapover front and short puff sleeves with narrow elastication. Sewn-on tie belt at the waist and a flared peplum.

Sleeveless dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a small opening and button at the back of the neck and flounces down the front that continue over the shoulders and down the back. Gathered seam at the top and a flared skirt.

Sleeveless dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a small opening and button at the back of the neck and flounces down the front that continue over the shoulders and down the back. Gathered seam at the top and a flared skirt.

Sleeveless dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a small opening and button at the back of the neck and flounces down the front that continue over the shoulders and down the back. Gathered seam at the top and a flared skirt.

Sleeveless dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a small opening and button at the back of the neck and flounces down the front that continue over the shoulders and down the back. Gathered seam at the top and a flared skirt.
Short-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey with a gathered frill trim around the neckline and sleeves.
Short-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey with a gathered frill trim around the neckline and sleeves.
Shorts in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated, drawstring waist.
Shorts in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated, drawstring waist.
Sleeveless top in soft, printed cotton jersey with narrow elastication and overlocked frill trims around the neckline and armholes.
Sleeveless top in soft, printed cotton jersey with narrow elastication and overlocked frill trims around the neckline and armholes.
Sleeveless top in soft, printed cotton jersey with narrow elastication and overlocked frill trims around the neckline and armholes.
Calf-length, circular skirt in imitation leather with visible seams and a concealed zip in one side. High waist and a detachable belt with a covered buckle. Unlined.
Tops in soft cotton jersey, one patterned. Press-studs at the back of the neck, and short, flounce-trimmed sleeves.
Shorts in soft cotton jersey, one patterned pair. Elasticated, drawstring waist and legs with flounce-trimmed hems.

Empire-line dress in soft cotton jersey with two layers of tulle on top and a shimmering metallic print. Picot trim around the neckline, a concealed press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y) and flutter sleeves.
Bodysuits in soft cotton jersey with flutter sleeves in a broderie anglaise weave. Lapped shoulders with a decorative picot trim and press-studs at the crotch.
Slingbacks in imitation suede with round toes, a bow across the foot and a narrow, elasticated strap around the heel. Imitation suede insoles. Heel 2 cm.
Hipster briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Set with a long-sleeved top in cotton jersey and skirt in textured-knit cotton. Top with an all-over print. Skirt with flounce-trimmed straps.
Set with a long-sleeved top in cotton jersey and skirt in textured-knit cotton. Top with an all-over print. Skirt with flounce-trimmed straps.
Trainer socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops. Three pairs with a motif on the top of the foot.

Short dress in an airy weave with a collar, buttons down the front, gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves with a tab and button. Gathered seam at the waist and a wide, softly draping skirt. Unlined.

Short dress in an airy weave with a collar, buttons down the front, gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves with a tab and button. Gathered seam at the waist and a wide, softly draping skirt. Unlined.

Shirt jacket in imitation leather with a wide collar, press-studs down the front and flap chest pockets. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, cuffs with press-studs, and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Lined.
5-pocket jeans in sturdy cotton denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and straight legs.

Short dress in a viscose weave with a small stand-up collar and V-neck opening at the top. Dropped shoulders, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.

Short dress in a viscose weave with a small stand-up collar and V-neck opening at the top. Dropped shoulders, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.

Short dress in a viscose weave with a small stand-up collar and V-neck opening at the top. Dropped shoulders, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.

Straight-cut blouse in taffeta with flounces down the front, back and sleeves. Opening with a covered button at the back of the neck and long balloon sleeves with gathers at the shoulders to create a puff effect, and narrow cuffs. Unlined.
Leggings in patterned jersey with flatlock seams and a high waist with covered elastication.
Platform sandals in soft suede with an adjustable heel strap with a metal buckle at one side. Leather linings and insoles. Heel 5.5 cm. Platform 4 cm.
Platform sandals in soft suede with an adjustable heel strap with a metal buckle at one side. Leather linings and insoles. Heel 5.5 cm. Platform 4 cm.

Calf-length dress in cotton poplin with short balloon sleeves that have pleats at the shoulders and elastication at the hems for added width. Visible zip at the back with an extra-long tab, and a slit at the back. Lined sleeves.

Calf-length dress in cotton poplin with short balloon sleeves that have pleats at the shoulders and elastication at the hems for added width. Visible zip at the back with an extra-long tab, and a slit at the back. Lined sleeves.
Short, sleeveless dress in woven fabric with a scalloped edge around the neckline and armholes. Concealed zip at the back, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Lined.
Short, sleeveless dress in woven fabric with a scalloped edge around the neckline and armholes. Concealed zip at the back, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Lined.
Short, sleeveless dress in woven fabric with a scalloped edge around the neckline and armholes. Concealed zip at the back, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Lined.

Knee-length dress in a viscose and linen weave with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front and cap sleeves. Concealed zip in one side, a seam and detachable belt with metal rings at the waist, and a gently flared skirt. Satin lining.
Short, fitted skirt in jersey. High waist with concealed elastication, and a slit at the front of the hem. Unlined.

Calf-length dress in pleated chiffon with a round neck, pin-tucks at the front and over the shoulders and short sleeves. Concealed buttons at the front, and concealed elastication and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Satin lining.

Calf-length dress in pleated chiffon with a round neck, pin-tucks at the front and over the shoulders and short sleeves. Concealed buttons at the front, and concealed elastication and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Satin lining.

Calf-length dress in pleated chiffon with a round neck, pin-tucks at the front and over the shoulders and short sleeves. Concealed buttons at the front, and concealed elastication and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Satin lining.
Long, sleeveless dress in crinkled chiffon with a deep V-neck and wrapover front and back. Narrow, elasticated seam at the waist. Satin lining.

Running trousers in fast-drying functional fabric designed to help keep you dry and cool while exercising. Elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist, zipped, mesh-lined side pockets, tapered legs with a zip at the hems, and reflective details.

Lightweight shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with internal elastication and a drawstring at the waist, zipped side pockets and rounded hems with wrapover sides. The polyester content of the shorts is partly recycled.
Trainer socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated, lace-trimmed tops.
Oversized, straight-cut, knee-length dress in stretch cotton twill with adjustable straps and an open chest pocket.
Oversized, straight-cut, knee-length dress in stretch cotton twill with adjustable straps and an open chest pocket.
Short cardigan in ribbed jersey with a V-neck, long sleeves and tie-front fastening.
Short cardigan in ribbed jersey with a V-neck, long sleeves and tie-front fastening.

Short cardigan in ribbed jersey with a V-neck, long sleeves and tie-front fastening.
Calf-length wrapover skirt in a patterned viscose weave with a high waist and concealed button and ties at one side. Unlined.
